tokens.text: defines a single structure template with processors

fields.title: Location
fields.description: The path of the structure file. This path is relative to the behavior pack's structures folder.

fields.title: Processors
fields.description: The identifier of the processor list to use when placing the structure.

description: Defines a single structure template element for template pools.
